item.description: For a good cause, Connecticut Aids Coalition, let's watch and experience the Oscars at the Real Art Ways! Imagine viewing this supreme of awards nights, the 84th Annual Academy Awards live telecast, on large screens throughout the venue and in a private cinema for viewing . While you watch in the glorious accommodations you will dine on delicious cuisine provided by: Carbone’s Ristorante, DISH Restaurant Group, East-West Grille, The G Stream, Grants Restaurant & Bar, Max Restaurant Group, Miya’s Sushi, Peppercorns Grill, Pond House Café, and Salute Restaurant. Support the event and the boost your own collectibles via a silent auction featuring a wide variety of fabulous items. You are a celebrity for the night and you can be awarded for it by winning prizes awarded for Most Glamorous. Bask in exuberant swag bags given to first 100 people to buy General Admission tickets. As you come in you will be interviewed on the red carpet by the Hartford Courant's Maryellen Fillo and WTNH News8's Teresa LaBarbera. The dress for the event is classy to formal. Details: Tickets: $55 - per person & $100 - per couple. To purchase tickets please click here: http://www.ctaidscoal...
item.how_to_find_us: Group Members will be mingling in the Real Art Ways Venue

group.name: Eat, Laugh, and Be Merry in West Hartford
